member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.ResourceParser.IsStyleTargetTypeLoaded(System.Xml.XmlReader)
member.summary: Determine if the current element in the reader represents a Style whose TargetType has been loaded in the assembly.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the element is not a style or it is a Style with a TargetType loaded in this assembly.
